message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, I'm looking to invest at a lower price point.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me and allows for some room for negotiation.

I understand you're looking for a lower price point, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value I have in mind. I can offer it to you for $875,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go for now.
